description: Subscription request for pushing live monitoring data to remote client.
title: LiveMonitoringSubscriptionRequest

uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

sub_interval.description: Subscription interval - The time interval (in seconds) in which the live monitoring data is requested. For Live subscription - 10 to 15 seconds. For Periodic subscription - 180 to 300 seconds(should be multiples of 30). Other values are invalidated. This field is mandatory if sub_action is specified as SA_PERIODIC_UPDATE.

sub_timeout_time.description: Subscription Timeout - Expiry time of the subscription. By default subscription will be served for 1 hour. If subscription need to be expired before 1 hour then expiry time need to be mentioned (in seconds).

sub_data_node_locator.description: Subscription Data Set - The data set which needs to be sent to the client every sub_interval. Examples: System Info Stats ==> "/sw/stats/sysInfoStats"           Per port stats    ==> "/sw/stats/portStats/<port_name>" This field is mandatory for adding Live subscription.
